src:
Big sports events today
05 Nov 2019, 18:45 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
NEW DELHI: Here are the big sports events lined up for Wednesday (November 6) that comprise the action from China Open badminton tournament and UEFA Champions League.

(All timings in IST)


1:30 am (Football - UEFA Champions League)

Liverpool vs Genk (Livepool won 2-1)
Napoli vs Salzburg (1-1)
Barcelona vs Slavia Prague (0-0)
Zenit vs Leipzig (Leipzig won 2-0)
Valencia vs Lille (Valencia won 4-1)
Lyon vs Benfica (Lyon won 3-1)
Chelsea vs Ajax (4-4)
Dortmund vs Inter Milan (Dortmund won 3-2)

8:30 am approx (Badminton - China Open)

Pranaav Jerry Chopra/N Sikki Reddy vs Wang Chi-Lin/Cheng Chi Ya (Chinese Taipei) in mixed doubles first round (Pranav-Sikki lost 14-21, 14-21)

9:00 am approx (Badminton - China Open)

Cai Yan Yan (China) vs Saina Nehwal in women's singles first round (Saina lost 9-21, 12-21)

9:55 am (Badminton - China Open)

Parupalli Kashyap vs Sitthikom Thammasin (Thailand) men's singles first round (Kashyap won 21-14, 21-13)

11:30 am (Badminton - China Open)

Tommy Sugiarto (Indonesia) vs B Sai Praneeth in men's singles first round

1:30 pm (Football - International Friendly)

India Women vs Vietnam Women

2:00 pm (Cricket - 1st ODI)

Afghanistan vs West Indies

2:50 pm (Badminton - China Open)

Sameer Verma vs Lee Cheuk Yiu (Hong Kong China) in men's singles first round

4:30 pm (Badminton - China Open)

Manu Attri/B Sumeeth Reddy vs Aaron Chia/Soh Wooi Yik (Malaysia) in men's doubles first round

7:00 pm (Cricket - 3rd ODI)

West Indies Women vs India Women

7:30 pm (Football - Indian Super League)

Hyderabad FC vs NorthEast United FC

9:20 pm (Football - UEFA Europa League)

Vitoria SC vs Arsenal

11:25 pm (Football - UEFA Champions League)

Bayern vs Olympiacos
Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus
